ygData.subject: RE: Elf Hide Gloves
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Fists: DMG: 2 Crystalline Blade: DMG: 11. Level 5 player using crystalline blade  (DMG * 2 + 1)  23 max. Level 38 player using crystalline blade (??)
ygData.messageBody:
>I'd hit for 5 a lot but 6 or 7 was max I'm pretty sure.

Fists: DMG: 2
Crystalline Blade: DMG: 11.

Level 5 player using crystalline blade (DMG * 2 + 1) 23 max.
Level 38 player using crystalline blade (??) 40 max.

Punching, same story.

Level 5, (DMG * 2 + 1) 5 max. (rarely, but it is the max)
Level 38, (??) 8 max.


23/40 = 0.575
5/8 = 0.625

those numbers are close enough meaning I probably haven't hit my
max dmg on my blade yet. (40 was the most I've seen so far).

What I'm getting at is 5 is the most damage you are gonna do til
level 15-20, when the dmg multipliers change. But the ratio never
changes. I wish I knew the multiplier at my level. (DMG * 3.66)??

My max dmg on a 6dmg weapon is 22.
My max dmg on a 11dmg weapon is 40.

Both those lead to a multiplier of 3.66

2 dmg fists * 3.66 = ceil(7.32) = 8.

Lots of math to back me up here, although it may not be 'Verant
math' which is known to exist.

Harmonic Distortion, 38th unchained melody.
League of Antonican Bards, The Wind Spirit's Song
< Keepers of Norrath > Innoruuk
